author: orlikowski
msg: Deprecate rather than remove the old method signatures.
These are wrappers over the new methods.
The floor is open to make the case for the old method signatures to remain.

author: orlikowski
msg: Ant'll tell you when you miss something.
Fix the build break due to the samples still using the old parameter list.
Let the apologies for build breakages Jakarta-wide commence.

author: orlikowski
